# Chick weight data

Summary of Chick Weight Data
```{r CWsum}
summary(ChickWeight)
```
# Chick weight plot

```{r CWplot}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Time, weight, colour=Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~Diet) + 
  stat_summary(fun.y="mean", geom="line", colour="black") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  ggtitle("Chick Weight over Time by Diet") +
  xlab("Time (days)") +
  ylab("Weight (grams)")
```
